LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_LeatherChain_Tooltip: Enables leather production chain, where animals give hides that must be processed into leather.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_WoodChain_Tooltip: Enables timber production chain, where trees give logs that have to be cut into planks for more use.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_ClothChain_Tooltip: Enables the cloth production chain, where raw materials from plants have to be spun into cloth.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_MetalChain_Tooltip: Enables the metal production chain, where raw ores must be smelted into ingots before use. Vanilla mineables will be forced on if this is inactive.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_SoilWear_Tooltip: Enables plowed soil wearing out and additional options to customize.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_AutoPlow_Tooltip: Enables automatically setting up blueprints for plowing soil after worn out.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_SoilWearChance_Tooltip: Chance that the soil be worn out after harvesting plant.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_SoilFertility_Tooltip: Changes the fertility of plowed soil.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_IndustrialJunk_Tooltip: Remove vanilla industrial junk during map creation.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_ExostriderRemains_Tool: Remove Biotech's exostrider remains during map creation.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_HornetNest_Tooltip: Remove hornet nests during map creation.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_VanillaMine_Tooltip: Restores vanilla mineables. Medieval Overhaul mineables will still be available.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_RefuelableTorch_Toolti: Removes fuel and heat from Vanilla and Medieval Overhaul torches.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_BoomalopeTar_Tooltip: Replace chemfuel with tar from Boomalopes and similar animals.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_MealRetexture_Tooltip: Retextures vanilla meal textures with Medieval Overhaul style graphics.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_SchematicRework_Toolti: Replace schematics scrolls with Biotech style analyzer.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_SlopDispenser_Tooltip: Recommend turning off for industrial playthroughs.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_ComponentRepair_Toolti: Will repair medieval techlevel buildigns with basic components.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_Experimental_Desc: The below patches are completely experimental and dangerous. No support will be given for issues relating to them.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_Chemfuel_Replace_Desc: Replaces all chemfuel in recipes and cost lists with tar.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_Component_Replace_Desc: Replaces all component in recipes and cost lists with MO's component. This does not change what is used to repair them.
